name: Last Man Standing (itch) (Tali Despins (Taffy Train), ZyronnSorrow, BeanBunz)
name_original: Last Man Standing (itch) (Tali Despins (Taffy Train), ZyronnSorrow, BeanBunz)
description:
This game was made in ~20 hours for GeoJAM 2022.

Wopse, small bug found when replaying (enemy dead no longer show); refreshing between runs is recommended!

Relive history with the Romans and the Barbarians! Pick a side and stand your ground.

The winds of war howl, and it falls upon you to pick a side in the upcoming battle ahead. Face the apocalypse and claim the lives of as many foes as you can, before entering the annals of history as a hero of your people!

Are you a Son of Rome, or Wodan's Heir?

Controls KEYBOARD/MOUSE Move WASD Aim Mouse Attack Mouse left click Credits Game Design and Artwork Programming & Unity Development Tali Y. Despins Kevin Moore Writing  & QA Music Composition Sebastien Guanzon Title: Tunc Alicioglu
Gameplay: Bobby Cole
End screen: Akashic Owl

Title and gameplay music licensed through Storyblocks.
A few of the wonderful Barbarian phrases were originally found here:  source
